mapper.select: select wms_cre_credit_line_other, business_model, remark, wms_cre_credit_head_id, create_user_id, create_user_name, date_format(create_timestamp,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as create_timestamp_str, create_timestamp, last_update_user_id, date_format(last_update_timestamp,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as last_update_timestamp_str, last_update_timestamp, enable_flag from wms_cre_credit_line_other where wms_cre_credit_line_other = #{wms_cre_credit_line_other}
select count(wms_cre_credit_line_other) as count from wms_cre_credit_line_other
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO wms_cre_credit_line_other ( wms_cre_credit_line_other,
business_model,
remark,
wms_cre_credit_head_id,
create_user_id,
create_user_name,
create_timestamp,
last_update_user_id,
last_update_timestamp,
enable_flag ) VALUES ( #{wms_cre_credit_line_other}, #{business_model}, #{remark}, #{wms_cre_credit_head_id}, #{create_user_id}, #{create_user_name}, #{create_timestamp}, #{last_update_user_id}, #{last_update_timestamp}, #{enable_flag} );
mapper.update:
update wms_cre_credit_line_other
wms_cre_credit_line_other = #{wms_cre_credit_line_other},
business_model = #{business_model},
remark = #{remark},
wms_cre_credit_head_id = #{wms_cre_credit_head_id},
create_user_id = #{create_user_id},
create_user_name = #{create_user_name},
create_timestamp = #{create_timestamp},
last_update_user_id = #{last_update_user_id},
last_update_timestamp = #{last_update_timestamp},
enable_flag = #{enable_flag},
where wms_cre_credit_line_other = #{wms_cre_credit_line_other}
